entry.def: A member of a group is one of the people, animals, or things belonging to that group.

example.ex: He refused to name the members of staff involved...
example.tran: 他拒绝说出所涉及员工的姓名。

example.ex: Their lack of training could put members of the public at risk.
example.tran: 他们缺乏训练，这有可能会使民众面临风险。

entry.def: A member of an organization such as a club or a political party is a person who has officially joined the organization.

example.ex: The support of our members is of great importance to the Association...
example.tran: 会员的支持对于我们协会来说非常重要。

example.ex: Britain is a full member of NATO.
example.tran: 英国是北大西洋公约组织的正式成员国。

entry.def: A member country or member state is one of the countries that has joined an international organization or group.
entry.tran: (某国际组织的)会员国，成员国

example.ex: ...the member countries of the European Free Trade Association.
example.tran: 欧洲自由贸易联盟的成员国

example.ex: ...a co-ordinated approach, with each member state doing what it could.
example.tran: 各成员国尽其所能的协作方式

entry.def: A member or Member is a person who has been elected to a parliament or legislature.

example.ex: He was elected to Parliament as the Member for Leeds.
example.tran: 他当选为利兹市议员而进入了议会。
代表比勒里基的保守党议员

means.word_mean: 1. one of the persons who compose a social group (especially individuals who have joined and participates in a group organization);

sentences.sentence: "she was introduced to all the members of his family"

means.word_mean: 2. an organization that is a member of another organization (especially a state that belongs to a group of nations);

sentences.sentence: "the library was a member of the interlibrary loan association"
"Canada is a member of the United Nations"

means.word_mean: 3. an external body part that projects from the body;

sentences.sentence: "it is important to keep the extremities warm"

means.word_mean: 4. anything that belongs to a set or class;

sentences.sentence: "snakes are members of the class Reptilia"

means.word_mean: 5. the male organ of copulation (`member' is a euphemism)

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin membrum 'limb'
